title: Steven Levitt: "Freakonomics"
description: In 2005, Michael ran a week-long series with University of Chicago professor Steven Levitt, co-author of "Freakonomics: A Rogue Economist Explores the Hidden Side of Everything" which was published 12 April 2005. Michael hosted him for a segment each day that week, highlighting different concepts from the book. Enjoy all five segments in this one podcast.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Steven Levitt)
